short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your virtual assistant on the web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A convenient way to navigate websites without a mouse. VI-like bindings to scroll up and down. A quick way to locate and open page links.

Press 'j' to scroll down.
Press 'k' to scroll up.
Press '/' to locate a page link and hit 'Enter' to follow it.
